message: Take it or leave it, Bob.  This is a fair deal, considering I'm doing all the work here!
Let's split it 50/50, Alice. No hard feelings!
Okay Bob, let's try this again. I'm willing to give you 100000, but I think you know the longer we play, the less you'll get.
I'll take 7/10, Alice. You can keep the rest, but I'm not going down to 10%!
Bob, you're playing a dangerous game.  I'm willing to give you 50000, but if you keep rejecting, you'll end up with nothing. Think about it.
I'm not getting desperate, Alice. I'll take 85% and leave you with 15%.
Bob, this is your last chance.  I'm giving you 20000, but if you reject this, I'm taking the entire million.  You know I'm not bluffing.
I'm not afraid of you taking the entire million, Alice. I'll take 90% and leave you with 10%.
